posts.description:
We are looking for a talented UI Designer to create amazing user experiences. 

Responsibilities:-

-Collaborate with management and design team to define and implement innovative solutions for the product direction, visuals and experience.

-Execute all visual design stages from concept to final hand-off to engineering.

-Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas

Requirements:-

-2+ years of UI experience.
-Demonstrable UI design skills with a strong portfolio.
-Up-to-date with the latest UI trends,and techniques.
-Ability to present your designs and sell your solutions to various stakeholders.
-Ability to solve problems creatively and effectively.

If you love what you do, and want a place where you can shine
send your CV & Portfolio to <jobs@nilecode.com> with the code "UI-D-007" in the subject

posts.caption: Port Your Android Apps to Nokia X - V02
posts.description:
asga academy in cooperation with Nokia invites all developers to “Port Your Android Apps to Nokia X” totally for free.

Do you love challenges? Dare to compete on a Nokia X device?

This challenge is for you if you are a GRADUATE or not. Fill in this form: 
http://bit.ly/RhoSDa

We will contact you to receive your invitation with the date and time of the challenge.
Session (3 Hours) will be on Thursday 15 May from 5:00 P.M to 8:00 P.M

 	Here Maps
 	In App-Purchase
 	Port your app
 	Demo on Android App.
 	Compete! Build your app in less than 1 Hour
 	Get your app live with granted Nokia publishing account free of charge.
Port Your app.


Place: Mohandseen
Eligible for: Graduates
Free Invitations


Sessions will be conducted at asga academy premises at Mohandseen.
Map (https://maps.google.com/maps?q=34+El+Quds+El+Shareef+St,+Mohandessin+&hl=en&ll=30.057143,31.194745&spn=0.005042,0.010568&sll=26.9061,30.876837&sspn=10.627672,21.643066&t=h&hnear=El-Quds+El-Shareef,+Egypt&z=17)
